details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.3 Document Information Dictionary - Keywords and pdf:Keywords
details.description: The value of Keywords entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property "pdf:Keywords" shall be equivalent

rule.description: The value of Keywords entry from the document information dictionary, if present, and its analogous XMP property "pdf:Keywords" shall be equivalent

error.message: The value of Keywords entry from the document Info dictionary and its matching XMP property "pdf:Keywords" are not equivalent (Info /Keywords = %1, XMP pdf:Keywords = %2)
